**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 33 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28 [Planar Terra-Cotta Soldier](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1469) **Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 52 **Perception** +21 **Languages** [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43); (can't speak any language) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +23, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +23 **Str** +7 **Dex** +5 **Con** +7 **Int** +2 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +4 **Items** [Composite Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74) (10 arrows), [Longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31), [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 13, HP 104, BT 52) --- **AC** 30 (32 with shield raised) **Fort** +24 **Ref** +21 **Will** +17 **HP** 250 **Immunities** bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [diseased](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Weaknesses** bludgeoning 14 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**[Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=32)** --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** longsword +24 ([versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 3d8+15 slashing **Ranged** composite shortbow +23 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 3d6+13 piercing **Planar Step** ([Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156)) The planar terra-cotta soldier momentarily moves beneath the [Material Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1), instantly transporting itself to a location within 60 feet. The soldier can't use Planar Step again for 1d4 rounds.
name: Planar Terra-Cotta Soldier
